text: 9|124|oru (putiya) attiyāyam aruḷappaṭṭāl ‘‘uṅkaḷil yāruṭaiya nampikkaiyai itu atikappaṭuttiyatu?'' Eṉṟu kēṭkakkūṭiyavarkaḷum avarkaḷil palar irukkiṉṟaṉar. Meyyākavē evarkaḷ nampikkaik koṇṭirukkiṟārkaḷō avarkaḷuṭaiya nampikkaiyai (itu) atikappaṭuttiyē viṭṭatu. Itaip paṟṟi avarkaḷ makiḻcciyaṭaikiṉṟaṉar
